name: School Toilet
description: The toilet is in the basement of your local high school. Even rats die from the smell.

name: Station
description: The Arctic Station, the only living creatures you've met here are bears.

name: Oil platform
description: 100 km off the coast of Norway, in the cold ocean, there is a half-destroyed oil platform, oil reserves may be useful to you.

name: Island in the Maldives
description: Once a very popular and expensive vacation spot. Now you are the only visitor here. Enjoy all the delights of a tropical climate from a luxury villa.

name: Statue of Liberty
description: The statue's pedestal contains a spacious secret bunker built in case of a nuclear war. The functionality is impressive.

name: Cruise ship
description: In the port there is a huge abandoned liner “Naomi“, which once carried out round-the-world cruises. Inside you can find a hotel, restaurants, bars and even a water park!

name: Great Wall of China
description: There is a sheltered shelter at the foot of the Great Wall of China. The date of its construction is written on the sign - February 18, 2010.

name: Austrian mountains
description: High in the Alps lies the refuge of the Swiss billionaire. Stylish cottage!

name: Hospital
description: An abandoned private clinic at your disposal! All four floors ...

name: Bank
description: Mountains of money and gold, but they are unlikely to be useful.

name: Easter Island
description: A secluded place in the Pacific Ocean. From time to time there are stone idols on the island. How did they appear here?

name: Vegas Casino
description: You can be sure of your safety if casino safes were found in the Middle Ages, they would have been the most unpleasant fortresses.

name: Station on the moon
description: A mock-up of a lunar station built for astronaut training.

name: Royal Palace
description: On the coast of the sea, in a cozy place, there is a huge secret palace. There is almost everything: a wine cellar, a hookah bar and even a garbage room!
